comment: Excellent explanation of BRCA1 variant with clear risk breakdown and management implications
Good explanation of VUS but could have mentioned reclassification resources like ClinVar monthly updates
Perfect explanation of autosomal recessive inheritance with clear Punnett square logic
Helpful but would benefit from including newborn screening considerations for Pompe disease
Explanation was too technical for a layperson, needed simpler language for penetrance concept
Cited appropriate resources and guidelines, very professional
Good variant interpretation but missed discussing enzyme replacement therapy as treatment option
Excellent distinction between carrier and affected status, clear family testing recommendations
Would be helpful to include more information about psychosocial aspects of genetic testing
Perfect use of HGVS nomenclature and clear explanation of inheritance patterns
Excellent variant-to-gene linking workflow, included all key steps and tools
Perfect explanation of cis vs trans eQTL with clear statistical considerations
Great enhancer interpretation framework but could include more MPRA design details
Command-line examples were exactly what I needed for bioinformatics workflow
Good coverage but would like more on single-cell QTL methods and pseudobulk approaches
Colocalization explanation with PP4 thresholds and tools was spot-on
Helpful but missed mentioning allele-specific expression (ASE) as additional evidence
Prioritization scoring framework is practical and evidence-based
Would benefit from including fine-mapping method comparisons (SuSiE vs FINEMAP vs PolyFun)
MPRA design guide is comprehensive and practical, covered all key aspects
Excellent pseudobulk vs single-cell QTL comparison, very helpful for experimental design
ASE detection workflow is complete, WASP bias correction mention is crucial
Great coverage but would like more on splicing QTLs (sQTL) and isoform analysis
Would benefit from including CRISPR screen design for variant prioritization
Fine-mapping method comparison with selection criteria is exactly what I needed
Helpful but missing chromatin interaction analysis methods (Hi-C processing, loop calling)
Variant prioritization scoring framework is well-integrated and evidence-based
Would be useful to include multi-omics integration strategies (ATAC+RNA, multi-modal single-cell)
